abstract: Readers comment on my column about Occupy Wall Street and the staggering economic inequality in the United States.
snippet: Readers comment on my column about Occupy Wall Street and the staggering economic inequality in the United States.
lead_paragraph: My Sunday column hopes and prays that the Occupy Wall Street movement will help put the issue of economic inequality on the national agenda for the 2012 election. It seems to me to be one of the background challenges our economy faces, and it's an issue of fairness, yet it has received very little attention until recently.
